title: shollittAn teriyumO
sahitya:
shollittAn teriyumO unakku shonnAl karuNai varumO en nilai


anupallavi

  allum paghalum un azhagu urukkANa Ashai koNDE vazhi pArtiruppadai nAn


caraNam    navilum nAvirkkinbam tOnrudE nAmam niraindu nenjattiruL vilagudE rAmA
 karainduLLam kaNNil panikkudE unai ninaindumE mei shilirkkudE idai
